mapper.select: SELECT a.*, b.customer_name, c.num AS contract_num, c.name AS contract_name, c.money AS contract_money, e.num as plan_num FROM wk_crm_receivables AS a LEFT JOIN wk_crm_customer AS b ON a.customer_id = b.customer_id LEFT JOIN wk_crm_contract AS c ON a.contract_id = c.contract_id LEFT JOIN wk_crm_receivables_plan as e on a.plan_id=e.plan_id WHERE a.receivables_id = #{id}

select rec.receivables_id,rec.number as receivables_num,scco.name contract_name,scco.money as contract_money ,rec.owner_user_id, rec.check_status,rec.return_time,rec.money as receivables_money,a.num as plan_num FROM `wk_crm_receivables` as rec left join `wk_crm_receivables_plan` a on rec.receivables_id = a.receivables_id left join wk_crm_contract as scco on scco.contract_id = rec.contract_id where rec.contract_id = #{contractId} and rec.check_status != 7 ${conditions}
